channel.title: [pi] bug where often peoples drops are dissapearing/not showing when they die
channel.description: Need help fixing a bug, where basically when someone dies and goes back to get their stuff its gone even though they have returned within 20seconds on death. This doesn't happen normally but seems to be happening too quite a few players. All help appreciated.

item.title: [pi] bug where often peoples drops are dissapearing/not showing when they die
item.dc:creator: @avirunes avirunes
item.description:
@avirunes wrote:

hawkgames:

Where they in a place like slayer tower or some place with another floor?

i’ve had reports of slayer tower, and chaos ele which is in lvl 55 wildy and no floor

Read full topic
